name: @seprich/re-future
description: Future and ResultFuture library for ReasonML
author: Jussi Seppälä <seprich@users.noreply.github.com>

scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run build && jest
scripts.perf: npm run clean && npm run build && node --expose-gc ./lib/js/__perf__/Main.bs.js
scripts.travis-ci: npm run clean && npm run build && jest --coverage --coverageReporters=text-lcov | coveralls
